body: Use the [Find a court or tribunal](https://www.find-court-tribunal.service.gov.uk) service to find out how to contact HMCTS about any other court and tribunal service.

components.html:
**If your query is urgent**

We aim to respond to queries we receive through this service within 10 working days. If your query is urgent, call:

* 0300 123 1072 for [probate enquiries](https://www.find-court-tribunal.service.gov.uk/courts/probate-service-centre)
* 0300 303 0642 for [divorce enquiries](https://www.find-court-tribunal.service.gov.uk/courts/divorce-service-centre)
* 0300 123 1372 for [court claims for money](https://www.find-court-tribunal.service.gov.uk/courts/county-court-money-claims-centre-ccmcc)

Our call centres are open Monday to Friday, 8am to 4pm.
Calls to these numbers cost up to 10p per minute from landlines and between 3p and 40p per minute from mobiles, depending on your provider.

## Before you start

To use this service you'll need:

* a case reference number (if you have one)
* an email address HMCTS can use to reply to you

If you're a legal professional, you'll need your client's name, address and date of birth. You can't use this service to send documents to HMCTS.

heading: Contact HMCTS
lede: Use this form to contact HMCTS about a probate or divorce application, or about a court claim for money
